articles.title: Craig Breslow believes Red Sox are in ‘improved position’ to get ‘right players’ this offseason
articles.description:
Breslow also acknowledged that the Red Sox have some "work to do."

The post Craig Breslow believes Red Sox are in ‘improved position’ to get ‘right players’ this offseason appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Craig Breslow states Red Sox are in a better position for offseason acquisitions.
Breslow acknowledges the team has significant work to do before the season starts.
Improved player acquisitions could enhance local fan engagement and team performance.

articles.title: Mike Vrabel says recent Patriots changes have nothing to do with wanting to separate from the past
articles.description:
Vrabel said he doesn't feel the burden of the past as the Patriots notably changed their pregame introductions ahead of their Week 8 win.

The post Mike Vrabel says recent Patriots changes have nothing to do with wanting to separate from the past appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mike Vrabel confirms Patriots' pregame changes are not about distancing from past traditions.
Changes were implemented ahead of the Patriots' Week 8 win on October 29, 2023.
Local fans may see a shift in team culture and game day experience.

articles.title: Bruins’ Elias Lindholm will miss ‘a few weeks’, Khusnutdinov promoted to 1C
articles.description:
With Lindholm out, Marat Khusnutdinov is expected to skate on Boston's top line.

The post Bruins’ Elias Lindholm will miss ‘a few weeks’, Khusnutdinov promoted to 1C appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Elias Lindholm will be out for a few weeks due to injury.
Marat Khusnutdinov is promoted to the first center position.
This lineup change affects the Bruins' performance for Boston fans.
